1.title: Kyle Simpson
1.desc: He is an evangelist of the open web, passionate about all things JavaScript.

2.title: Scott Issac
2.desc: He is a software architect who is best known for the development of Dynamic HTML, which is at the core of what is commonly termed Ajax.

3.title: John Ressig
3.desc: He is an American software engineer and entrepreneur, best known as the creator and lead developer of the jQuery JavaScript library
